title: Diya Lamp
description:
A lamp made of brass or clay, displayed with a lit wick leading into oil or ghee.

Commonly used in Hindu, Sikh, Jain and Zoroastrian religious festivals such as Diwali.
apple_vendor_description: The diya lamp emoji on Apple devices glows with a warm, inviting light, its terracotta-colored body crafted with realistic textures and soft 3D shading that highlight its handcrafted feel. The flame flickers gently, casting a soft radiance that embodies hope and spiritual illumination, a beautiful example of Apple's attention to detail. This symbol of light and celebration on Apple devices is perfect for conveying blessings, festivals, or moments of inner peace.
